name: RetrieveSubscriptionDetails
description:
Retrieve details of a specific subscription using its ID.

Use this tool to obtain information about a subscription by providing its unique subscription ID. Useful for accessing current subscription status, billing, and service details.

parameters.name: subscription_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the subscription to retrieve details for. Necessary to specify which subscription to access.

value_schema.description: The ID of the subscription to retrieve.

parameters.name: include_related_info
parameters.description: Specify related info to include in the response. Use 'actions' to include scheduled actions on the subscription.

value_schema.description:
A query parameter to specify related information to be included in the response. 

The supported query parameter values are: 

- `actions`: to include scheduled actions on the targeted subscription.
